channel.title: CVE Feed for xstream -- Woodstox
channel.description: The latest CVEs for xstream -- Woodstox

item.title: CVE-2022-40152|2024-09-16T19:14:50.292Z -- xstream -- woodstox
item.description: Those using Woodstox to parse XML data may be vulnerable to Denial of Service attacks (DOS) if DTD support is enabled. If the parser is running on user supplied input, an attacker may supply content that causes the parser to crash by stackoverflow. This effect may support a denial of service attack.
